verses.verse: Now when these things were done <S%H3615><s%>, the princes <S%H8269><s%> came <S%H5066><s%> to me <S%H559><s%>, saying, The people <S%H5971><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and the priests <S%H3548><s%>, and the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, have not separated <S%H914><s%> themselves from the people <S%H5971><s%> of the lands <S%H776><s%>, doing according to their abominations <S%H8441><s%>, even of the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%>, the Hittites <S%H2850><s%>, the Perizzites <S%H6522><s%>, the Jebusites <S%H2983><s%>, the Ammonites <S%H5984><s%>, the Moabites <S%H4125><s%>, the Egyptians <S%H4713><s%>, and the Amorites <S%H567><s%>.

For they have taken <S%H5375><s%> of their daughters <S%H1323><s%> for themselves <S%H1121><s%>, and for their sons: so that the holy <S%H6944><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%> have mingled <S%H6148><s%> themselves with the people <S%H5971><s%> of those lands <S%H776><s%>: Yes <S%H3027><s%>, the hand of the princes <S%H8269><s%> and rulers <S%H5461><s%> has been chief <S%H7223><s%> in this trespass <S%H4604><s%>.

And when I heard <S%H8085><s%> this thing <S%H1697><s%>, I tore <S%H7167><s%> my garment <S%H899><s%> and my mantle <S%H4598><s%>, and plucked off <S%H4803><s%> the hair <S%H8181><s%> of my head <S%H7218><s%> and of my beard <S%H2206><s%>, and sat down <S%H3427><s%> astonished <S%H8074><s%>.

Then were assembled <S%H622><s%> unto me every one that trembled <S%H2730><s%> at the words <S%H1697><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, because of the transgression <S%H4604><s%> of those that had been carried away <S%H1473><s%>; and I sat <S%H3427><s%> astonished <S%H8074><s%> until the evening <S%H6153><s%> sacrifice <S%H4503><s%>.

And at the evening <S%H6153><s%> sacrifice <S%H4503><s%> I arose up <S%H6965><s%> from my heaviness <S%H8589><s%>; and having tore <S%H7167><s%> my garment <S%H899><s%> and my mantle <S%H4598><s%>, I fell <S%H3766><s%> upon my knees <S%H1290><s%>, and spread out <S%H6566><s%> my hands <S%H3709><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> my God <S%H430><s%>,

And said <S%H559><s%>, O my God <S%H430><s%>, I am ashamed <S%H954><s%> and blush <S%H3637><s%> to lift up <S%H7311><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> to you <S%H430><s%>, my God: for our iniquities <S%H5771><s%> are increased <S%H7235><s%> over <S%H4605><s%> our head <S%H7218><s%>, and our trespass <S%H819><s%> is grown up <S%H1431><s%> unto the heavens <S%H8064><s%>.

Since the days <S%H3117><s%> of our fathers <S%H1><s%> have we been in a great <S%H1419><s%> trespass <S%H819><s%> unto this day <S%H3117><s%>; and for our iniquities <S%H5771><s%> have we <S%H4428><s%>, our kings, and our priests <S%H3548><s%>, been delivered <S%H5414><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the lands <S%H776><s%>, to the sword <S%H2719><s%>, to captivity <S%H7628><s%>, and to a plunder <S%H961><s%>, and to confusion <S%H1322><s%> of face <S%H6440><s%>, as it is this day <S%H3117><s%>.

And now for a little <S%H4592><s%> space <S%H7281><s%> grace <S%H8467><s%> has been shown from the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>, to leave <S%H7604><s%> us a remnant to escape <S%H6413><s%>, and to give <S%H5414><s%> us a nail <S%H3489><s%> in his holy <S%H6944><s%> place <S%H4725><s%>, that our God <S%H430><s%> may lighten <S%H215><s%> our eyes <S%H5869><s%>, and give <S%H5414><s%> us a little <S%H4592><s%> reviving <S%H4241><s%> in our bondage <S%H5659><s%>.

For we were bondmen <S%H5650><s%>; yet our God <S%H430><s%> has not forsaken <S%H5800><s%> us in our bondage <S%H5659><s%>, but has extended <S%H5186><s%> mercy <S%H2617><s%> unto us in the sight <S%H6440><s%> of the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Persia <S%H6539><s%>, to give <S%H5414><s%> us a reviving <S%H4241><s%>, to set up <S%H7311><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of our God <S%H430><s%>, and to repair <S%H5975><s%> the desolations <S%H2723><s%> there <S%H5414><s%>, and to give us a wall <S%H1447><s%> in Judah <S%H3063><s%> and in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.
And now <S%H430><s%>, O our God, what shall we say <S%H559><s%> after <S%H310><s%> this <S%H5800><s%>? for we have forsaken your commandments <S%H4687><s%>,

Which you have commanded <S%H6680><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> your servants <S%H5650><s%> the prophets <S%H5030><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, The land <S%H776><s%>, unto which you go <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it <S%H5079><s%>, is an unclean land <S%H776><s%> with the filthiness <S%H5079><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> of the lands <S%H776><s%>, with their abominations <S%H8441><s%>, which have filled <S%H4390><s%> it from one end <S%H6310><s%> to another <S%H6310><s%> with their uncleanness <S%H2932><s%>.

Now therefore give <S%H5414><s%> not your daughters <S%H1323><s%> unto their sons <S%H1121><s%>, neither take <S%H5375><s%> their daughters <S%H1323><s%> unto your sons <S%H1121><s%>, nor seek <S%H1875><s%> their peace <S%H7965><s%> or their wealth <S%H2896><s%> for <S%H5704><s%> ever <S%H5769><s%>: that you may be strong <S%H2388><s%>, and eat <S%H398><s%> the good <S%H2898><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>, and leave it for an inheritance <S%H3423><s%> to your sons <S%H1121><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>.

And after <S%H310><s%> all that is come <S%H935><s%> upon us for our evil <S%H7451><s%> deeds <S%H4639><s%>, and for our great <S%H1419><s%> trespass <S%H819><s%>, seeing that you our God <S%H430><s%> have punished <S%H2820><s%> us less <S%H4295><s%> than our iniquities <S%H5771><s%> deserve <S%H5414><s%>, and have given us such deliverance as this <S%H6413><s%>;

Should we again <S%H7725><s%> break <S%H6565><s%> your commandments <S%H4687><s%>, and join in affinity <S%H2859><s%> with the people <S%H5971><s%> of these abominations <S%H8441><s%>? would not you be angry <S%H599><s%> with us until you had consumed <S%H3615><s%> us <S%H7611><s%>, so that there should be no remnant nor escaping <S%H6413><s%>?

O Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, you are righteous <S%H6662><s%>: for we remain <S%H7604><s%> yet escaped <S%H6413><s%>, as it is this day <S%H3117><s%>: behold <S%H6440><s%>, we are before you in our trespasses <S%H819><s%>: for we cannot stand <S%H5975><s%> before you because of this <S%H6440><s%>.
